Posts.EditableText:
In about a month's time, **Polar Jam** will come to an end. There's still oodles of time left to make a game for this, and I'm impatient to see what you guys will come up with, so what are you waiting for?

The theme (as you might have guessed by now) is **polar exploration and polar regions** (along with all their associated mysteries)

The itch.io page is here:

https://itch.io/jam/polar

**Twine, Squiffy, Quest and parser equally welcome!** Deadline is July the 16th. No prizes, just for fun. 

Yours sincerely

Peregrine

PS some friendly people are offering to **make music for use in your Polar Jam games** https://itch.io/jam/polar/topic/79667/music
so fear not and _be awesome!_
